author: vmassol
msg: Separate dist and dist-clean goals. dist-clean performs a clean before building the project

author: vmassol
msg: added top level "dist" goal that calls all "dist" goals of all subprojects

msg: Added dependency on the cactus2 maven plugin as it's a prerequisite

author: vmassol
msg: Added a "dist" goal so that all projects have one. This allows using the multiproject plugin at the top level to call all dist goals.

author: vmassol
msg: align name with other projects so that all project names start with "Cactus2 ..."
